title: How to Motivate Someone?
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Dia, could you help me with something......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>If it’s something I’m capable of, sure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>So it’s almost midterm season. Ho...... Someone I know is having trouble focusing while studying. Do you know of a way that I could help them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s a, um...... difficult question. I’m having the same problem. Chi..... I’m also trying to find a good way to motivate my friends to study.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I see you also have the same problem. I tried the pep talk strategy, but it didn’t work.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What about offering a reward?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’ve tried that...... But a half-hearted reward doesn’t work......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>What could we possibly have to offer them to motivate them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......There has to be something that will make them think, “I have to do this”......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Maybe we could do another king of idiots competition.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
